name: grossjungig-api
description: Gro√üjungig AI is reinventing intergenerational co-living in big cities. By bringing seniors and young people together, we make the world more connected and promote social cohesion. A platform intended to connect seniors with a room to spare in their apartment, with potential tenants who are youth, with the intention of mutual support and reducing loneliness whilst offering lower rent prices for the youth. visit: https://grossjungig.vercel.app/
author: Akua Appiah-Lindberg
